##Teacher in the rear, I'm fighting the plague through the screen

WMSYGSDR

Function introduction, each line has the earnest person, again the ordinary person also has the extraordinary story. Huazhong University of Science and Technology Press Official non-fiction story platform, the story of the people will meet here.

![img](data:image/jpeg;base64,)
“

- In the event of an outbreak -

She doesn't ask her students to become medical workers, scientists, police officers, construction workers, teachers, but she does ask her students to study hard, in the future, we must protect those who have protected them with the knowledge and skills we have learned, known and possessed.

”

“

- In the event of an outbreak -

She doesn't ask her students to become medical workers, scientists, police officers, construction workers, teachers, but she does ask her students to study hard, in the future, we must protect those who have protected them with the knowledge and skills we have learned, known and possessed.

- In the event of an outbreak -

She doesn't ask her students to become medical workers, scientists, police officers, construction workers, teachers, but she does ask her students to study hard, in the future, we must protect those who have protected them with the knowledge and skills we have learned, known and possessed.

”

1

Zhang has not seen her 43 students for 24 days.

January 17, watching his students receive various awards, Winter Vacation Homework, happy with their parents go home that moment, Zhang Mingliang mood is relaxed, happy, happy.

These children, who have just entered the primary school classroom from kindergarten, have grown and improved a lot after a semester of education and training. Like 43 seedlings, one after another to break ground germination, growth promising. According to the Yancheng City Education Bureau and the school's original plan, she will see the children again on February 10 and continue to lead them to grow up together.

Accidents Happen fast.

"Wuhan Pneumonia" news spread more and more widely, has been immersed in the festive atmosphere to welcome the new year, Zhang Mingliang also perceived the situation is grim. On January 23rd, the school's official Weibo Account officially launched an article titled, Covid-19, Pass It on to parents. At that moment, all the teachers, including Zhang Mingliang, had a new task: to protect other people's children.

School requirements during the anti-epidemic work must be done "class in place, students in place. ". According to the unified deployment and arrangements of the school, Zhang Mingliang began to take charge of the health care of a (1) class of 43 students.

The first thing to do is to make all parents aware of the seriousness of the pneumonia crisis. During winter vacation, parents are busy with their children to visit friends, travel. To keep their children in their homes for as little time as possible.

Schools began to disseminate information about parents and COVID-19 on an ad hoc basis. Zhang Mingliang the first time to build the group, began normal screening and registration, daily statistics of the child's health, travel status, and require the child at home isolation for at least 14 days. During this period, but also in the group of Irregular Push epidemic-related Knowledge.

Parents who had been immersed in the festive atmosphere of the Chinese New Year did not realize the seriousness of the problem at first. Many parents in private schools and teachers are in the "fuss" feeling. But under Zhang Mingliang's strict and strict requirements, they also gradually realized the harmfulness and severity of the epidemic.

An outsider who has nothing to do with your child, demands that you, as a parent, report the health of your child every day. One day without feeling, two weeks without feeling. In the eyes of many parents, the original child cold, fever, leaving a runny nose is a normal thing. Now they, too, have begun to watch their children's every move carefully, for fear that they might be a little uncomfortable.

Parents began to work together with Zhang Mingliang to protect the children.

Because of the active cooperation of all the parents, Zhang is clear about the daily situation of the 43 children. Before this, in order not to miss any information, her mobile phone is 24 hours does not shut down, does not mute.

Although schools and teachers are meticulous in their care, the situation outside is still getting worse.

2

On January 27, Yancheng's education bureau officially issued a notice to delay the start of the 2020 spring semester. The original February 10th start date was postponed to February 17th.

Medical workers, police officers, workers, scientists and volunteers are all rushing to the front line of the war against the plague. They are all doing their best to use their knowledge and skills to build a Great Wall of defense for the people of the whole country. Zhang Mingliang served in the school did not fall off the ranks in the rear, but also timely hit the "delay not suspended, learning not delayed" as if we are in action.

As a teacher, at this time Zhang Mingliang faced a new challenge: Start Online learning. Prepare electronic textbooks, prepare classes, publish class schedules, and urge parents to download textbooks, understand class platforms, and submit assignments. She has to get her work done before classes begin on February 10th.

This is also the first time that Zhang Mingliang challenges the network to teach.

The school's Organization and Division of Labor are clear. Teachers are required to work in teams, to prepare lessons collectively and to develop a mature lesson plan within two weeks. The school not only assigned teaching tasks, but also clearly stipulated that the relevant departments will be organized after the start of the semester to check the teachers'teaching and research work.

In other words, schools are asking teachers not only to keep online programs on schedule for two weeks, but also to ensure the quality of teaching.

Because of the delay in starting school, Zhang Mingliang must continue to take care of every student at home and not go out. Now he has to count the travel of each student's family members one by one and fill out relevant questionnaires. As she continued with her normal screening and registration, she began preparing classes with her colleagues.

Zhang Mingliang, who already has no leisure time, is even busier. She's even a little nervous. Not Because of the intensity of the task, but because she wasn't sure how effective the online course would be, or whether she would be a good online teacher, or, more uncertainly, across the screen, is there any way she can observe and catch every child's reaction in time, as she has in the past.

Do the kids really listen? ARE THEY GONNA GO AWOL? Zhang Mingliang can not control it alone now. With the supervision of the parents and the discipline of the children.

While preparing for class, Zhang Mingliang suddenly had an impulse to teach all the knowledge he had mastered all at once to the students. She wants her students to learn in a short time and make rapid progress. It is unrealistic to expect young plants to grow into towering trees overnight. She knows the Law of education, understand that she has a pull seedlings to help the mentality. This has never happened before in the teaching process. But, at this point, she really wanted her students to be One Foot in Heaven.

On February 6, the Jiangsu Provincial Government issued a notice delaying the start of the school year, and the whole province was barred from starting school until the end of February. The announcement made Zhang Mingliang, already nervous, even more anxious.

That means she won't be able to see her students until early March. Until then, they must rely on the Internet to communicate, communicate, teach, and answer questions. On the one hand, she is happy that the children can continue to be isolated in the home under strict supervision; on the other hand, she is worried about the children's learning and growth.

Zhang Mingliang's students are only in the first grade, and there are still many opportunities to make up for it. At this time, she already has the constraint and worry that her teaching plan and rhythm have been disturbed. The situation of those teachers who are in charge of the key points of the junior college, the junior college and the senior college is even more predictable. Teachers Teaching is like cutting Leeks, this crop cut, can continue to cut a knife, but the vast majority of students only once.

Or a chance at a life that's tied to one's own destiny.

3

"Don't leave school, don't quit teaching, don't quit classes. ". On February 10th, the online lecture went ahead as planned. Morning reading, class work, after-school work should have a lot of links.

Because, the preliminary preparation work is sufficient, the entire class of students in the prescribed time, punctually entered the network study classroom. Even more than before in the classroom into the state of class. The course went smoothly, which made Zhang Mingliang, who had been in a nervous state, breathe a sigh of relief.

At the end of the class, Zhang checks each student in the group to make sure they have completed their assigned tasks. At the moment, she can not master the degree of absorption of each student's learning, but at least to ensure that each student has completed the required learning tasks. As for how to teach each student well through the screen supervision, will be the focus of her work and research after this.

The days of online instruction will continue for some time. These days, Zhang Mingliang believes that every education front-line workers will spend with uneasy mood. Is it time to learn? Do you understand me? Do you have what you need? And the quality of the school? Not only do they have to worry about their own children, but they worry about other people's children. As a teacher, she must constantly adjust herself to ensure that she is always in good condition, leading parents, children together to accept new, unknown challenges.

Zhang Mingliang's anti-epidemic work is continuing.

In just twenty short days, the outbreak had brought her and 43 other families together, and she had seen a lot of funny and emotional things that she had never seen before.

A naughty little boy who always runs away when the next bell rings, after being told by himself and his parents about the dangers of viruses outside and the need for isolation at home, during his mother's regular window-opening ventilation, one of them jumped into the corner farthest from the window, shouting, "mom, you open any window, the virus has been put in. "

A peer in the group tells parents to look after their children, regardless of the image of a teacher, "If the inspection team finds a child outside during the 14-day period, it will hold the person concerned and the supervisor responsible. Please keep an eye on the child. "

Many of the original to a holiday in the flying state of the children, since the outbreak, consciously at home reading, learning up. They say it's more serious than it was at school. This is more or less comforting for parents and teachers.

There is a like to see a variety of animation cartoon little girl, the past worship is a variety of magical cartoon characters. At home, suddenly began to say "Zhong Nanshan" these three words. The grandfather wasn't a magician, just a doctor, and she didn't know exactly what the man did, but the overwhelming amount of news and information had taught her to associate the word "hero" with the man.

Most touching is to hear that one family's children, in the early days of the epidemic, all people think that middle-aged and old people are more susceptible to infection, while young people and children are not easy to get infected, and take the initiative to not let their grandmother go out to buy food, volunteered to go out instead of grandma. On the way to the supermarket, a family of three armed to the teeth, the child held tightly to her father's and mother's arms and said, "Daddy, Mommy, I love you. " In fact, she was worried that she was ill, and that her parents were ill.

Her parents were deeply moved by it. Across the screen, Zhang Mingliang, who had heard the news, did the same.

In the face of the epidemic, there is no one lucky and bystanders. Everyone's life has been threatened and affected in different degrees. This group of students in the first time to get special attention and care. Everyone is working hard to minimize the impact of the outbreak on the student community and to create a healthy, safe and secure living, learning, growing environment and atmosphere for them in the first place.

To protect their safety and health, but also to ensure that they learn and grow.

Teachers are assigned to take care of students, delay the start of classes, change the teaching model, organize lesson preparation, conduct seminars, arrange for teachers to record free online courses, cable and mobile companies to provide technical support.

These people who fight the epidemic in the rear, spare no effort to use their own strength to guard the children of thousands of families.

Because children represent the hope of a family, a nation, and a nation. Hope is Circle of Life. The green water flows forever, the thousand mountains remain.

Zhang's students are still very young. Many of them only know that there is a virus outside and they can not go out. They have to study at home. Most of them do not yet understand how serious the epidemic is outside, how stressful, dangerous and difficult life is in the affected areas, and how much the whole country and society has been hit by the epidemic. Even some children may still feel frustrated and complain that they can't go out and play with their classmates.

At this time, Zhang Mingliang will be glad he is a teacher, an educator.

Zhang Mingliang has decided that when she and the children stand face to face in the same classroom again, she will tell her children, are medical workers, scientists, police, construction workers, teachers, community workers, etc. , with their knowledge and skills together to defeat the virus, so that they can go out the door, into the sun, into the classroom happy to learn and grow.

Zhang Mingliang looks forward to such a moment as soon as possible.

Zhang Mingliang is a pseudonym

-END-

- Writing Star.-yeah

/ / Life is short, try to be a man with a story. //
